mapper.insert:
insert into product values(null, #{productName}, #{price}, now(), #{productEtc}, #{categoryNo})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select:
select a.product_no as product, a.product_name as productName, a.price, a.product_date as productDate, a.product_etc as productEtc, b.category_name as categoryName, a.category_no as categoryNo from product a , category b where a.category_no = b.category_no
and a.product_name like CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%')
and a.category_no = #{categoryNo}
order by a.price desc
order by a.price asc
order by a.product_name desc
order by a.product_name asc
